alert.note: Alert for Dickinson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 05 at 11:25AM CDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Iowa... Little Sioux River near Milford affecting Dickinson County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in South Dakota...Iowa... Willow Creek near Crooks affecting Minnehaha County. Little Sioux River at Spencer affecting Clay County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Sioux River near Milford. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, significant amounts of pasture and other farm lands begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 13.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM CDT Wednesday was 13.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain near the crest of 13.7 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Little Sioux River Milford 12.0 13.5 Wed 10 am 13.7 13.6 13.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next scheduled statement will be issued late Thursday morning.
